no.hig.hers.ludoclient

Class GameHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.hig.hers.ludoclient.GameHandler

  • public class GameHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    GameHandler creates all the different lobbyController objects and game object and controller createGameLobby, hostGameLobby and playerGameLobby gameClientUI The connection too gameserver is also set aswell as the connection loop for proccessing messages from the gameserver
    Author:
    Petter on 27.11.2015

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameHandler(int serverPort, java.lang.String ip, int caseNr, java.lang.String hostName)
      Makes the thread for proccessConnection And sets the connection information and who is hosting and the type iof lobby to be created

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPlayer(java.lang.String name)
      Adds the player too the playerList in createGameLobby
      void close()
      Shuts down the threads and closes the connection to the gameserver and the output and input
      void closeTab()
      closes the connection too gameserver and removes the gameTab object from list and the gameHandler object from list aswell
      void connect()
      Connects to the gameserver with the given ip and serverPort set in the constructor and sends if the user is the host and the userName from when you login
      void createNewLobby()
      Makes an new tab to be added to the gameTabs in Main and setOnClosed on the tab to remove every object that is in the tab, and sends gamelost to globalserver and disconnet to gameserver
      boolean getCaseNr()
      Get the lobby type of the GameHandler object
      java.lang.String getHostName()
      Gives the hostName of the user that is hosting the game
      void processConnection()
      Starts an infinite loop to proccess all messages from the gameserver
      void removePlayer(java.lang.String name)
      Removes the player from the playerList in createGameLobby
      void sendText(java.lang.String textToSend)
      Method used to send a message to the server.

        Parameters:

        ip - Of the game host.
        caseNr - Witch lobby type to be created.
        hostName - Name of the hosting player.

        public void connect()
        Connects to the gameserver with the given ip and serverPort set in the constructor and sends if the user is the host and the userName from when you login

      • sendText

        public void sendText(java.lang.String textToSend)
        Method used to send a message to the server. Handled in a separate method to ensure that all messages are ended with a newline character and are flushed (ensure they are sent.)
        Parameters:
        textToSend - the message to send to the server

      • processConnection

        public void processConnection()
        Starts an infinite loop to proccess all messages from the gameserver

      • createNewLobby

        public void createNewLobby()
        Makes an new tab to be added to the gameTabs in Main and setOnClosed on the tab to remove every object that is in the tab, and sends gamelost to globalserver and disconnet to gameserver

        Shuts down the threads and closes the connection to the gameserver and the output and input
